word_mean: 人工补充土壤水分以改善作物生长条件的技术措施。

sentence.Network_en: The rivers merge just north of a vital irrigation system.
sentence.Network_cn: 就在一个重要的灌溉系统的北边，这些河流交汇在一起。

sentence.Network_en: There the irrigation canal links up with the reservoir.
sentence.Network_cn: 这条灌溉渠在那里与水库连接起来.

sentence.Network_en: Irrigation is easy in the South because of the abundance of water.

list.abs: 漫_百度百科 ... 漫灌[ basin irrigation] 漫灌[ flow;flood irrigation] 漫画[ caricature;cartoon].
irrigation 灌溉irrigation canal 灌溉渠irrigation network 灌溉网
滴灌（drip irrigation）是利用塑料管道将水通过直径约10mm毛管上的孔口或滴头送到作物根部进行局部灌溉。它是目前干旱缺水地区 …
灌溉农业(Irrigated farming)通常指以水利灌溉设施为保障,满足作物对水份要求以获得稳产高产的农业。灌溉的作用除满足水分的需要外,还可以调节土壤温度、湿度、土壤.

entry.def: To irrigate land means to supply it with water in order to help crops grow.

example.ex: None of the water from Lake Powell is used to irrigate the area.
example.tran: 鲍威尔湖的水一滴都没有用于灌溉该地区。

example.ex: ...strips of cultivated land irrigated by a maze of interconnected canals.
example.tran: 由纵横交错的运河灌溉的一条条狭长耕地区域

means.word_mean: 1. supplying dry land with water by means of ditches etc
2. (medicine) cleaning a wound or body organ by flushing or washing out with water or a medicated solution

stems_affixes.word_buile: accommodate向…提供住处+ion动作或状态等→accommodation住处,膳宿
communicate交流;通讯+ion动作或状态等→communication传达,信息
congratulate祝贺,庆贺+ion动作或状态等→congratulation祝词,贺辞
consolidate巩固,加强+ion动作或状态等→consolidation巩固,合并
correlate使相互关联+ion动作或状态等→correlation相互关系,相关[性]
dictate口述,口授+ion动作或状态等→dictation
elevate举起,提拔+ion动作或状态等→elevation上升,提高
eliminate除去;淘汰;排[删,消]除+ion动作或状态等→elimination排除,除去,消除,消灭

stems_affixes.value_cn: 用公式表示,明确地表达,作简洁陈述
stems_affixes.word_buile: formulate用公式表示;系统地阐述+ion动作或状态等→formulation用公式表示,明确地表达,作简洁陈述
imitate模仿+ion动作或状态等→imitation模仿,效法
introduce引入,介绍+tion动作或状态等→introduction介绍
irrigate灌溉+ion动作或状态等→irrigation灌溉
reduce减少,缩小+tion动作或状态等→reduction减少

stems_affixes.value_cn: 关系,联系,叙述,故事,亲戚
stems_affixes.word_buile: relate叙述,讲,使联系,发生关系+ion动作或状态等→relation关系,联系,叙述
reproduce生殖;再现;繁殖+tion动作或状态等→n.繁殖,再现,复制品
requisite需要的+ion动作或状态等→requisition征用,要求

stems_affixes.value_cn: 翻译,译文,转化,调任,转换[物][数]平移
stems_affixes.word_buile: translate翻译,解释;转化+ion动作或状态等→translation翻译,译文,转化

Sentence.sentence: Donna helped the people of the village to organize an irrigation project, and she also advised them on planting corps that didn't require much water.
Better irrigation can dramatically improve crop yield and about 40% of the world's food supply is currently derived from irrigated land.
However, water used in irrigation is often sourced unsustainably

jushi.english: Irrigation is needed to make crops grow in dry regions.
jushi.chinese: 要使庄稼在干旱地区生长,需要灌溉。
